DOC.brief_summary: The purpose trial evaluate compare stability orthodontic treatment Essix retainer bond cuspid-to-cuspid retainer ( CTC ) , respectively mandibular arch longitudinally follow patient time 5 year . The patient ' perception two method also evaluate questionnaire follow-up period . A aim study analyze relationship diagnosis , treatment outcome , treatment time , age start treatment stability Essix retainer maxilla . The null hypothesis : - difference retention capacity Essix retainer cuspid-to-cuspid retainer - difference patient ' perception Essix retainer cuspid-to-cuspid retainer - difference retention capacity Essix retainer maxilla concern diagnosis treatment , treatment outcome , treatment time age start treatment
DOC.brief_title: Vacuum-formed Retainer Versus Bonded Retainer Prevent Relapse After Orthodontic Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct Orthodontic Clinic , GÃ¤vle , Sweden consist 104 patient . All patient treat fixed appliance upper low jaw ( standard .022 straight wire ) , without extraction . The patient randomize two group 52 patient group ( Group A : cuspid-to-cuspid retainer , Group B : Essix retainer ) . Dental cast obtain debond appointment ( T1 ) follow-up control six month ( T2 ) , 18 month ( T3 ) 60 month ( T4 ) group . At visit two week retention follow-up visit 6 , 18 60 month patient assess questionnaire order evaluate experience retention retention device .
DOC.criteria: Patients treat fixed appliance maxilla mandible Rapid Maxillary Expansion ( RME ) patient severe transversal malocclusion Treatment segment appliance Patients craniofacial anomaly patient require orthognatic surgery Patients miss mandibular incisor
